attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Free Simon Cramer  AKA the boss 

He is a hard working business man who let his temper slip one time due to a former employee attempting to steal from him

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/top-stories/2008/09/29/boss-arrested-for-parading-suspected-thief-with-sign-round-his-neck-115875-20760853/

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
